name: affilicats
description: Progressive Web App demo that showcases flaky network resilience measures

scripts.build: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && cp src/favicon.ico docs && node build/build.js > docs/manifest.webmanifest && imagemin src/img/*.{webp,png,svg,jpg,jpeg} --out-dir=docs/img && minify src/**.js --out-dir docs && minify src/js/**.js --out-dir docs/js && postcss "src/css/**.css" --use cssnano --map false --dir docs/css && html-minifier --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --minify-js --custom-attr-collapse /on/ --remove-attribute-quotes --process-scripts 'text/javascript' --sort-attributes --sort-class-name --minify-urls --input-dir ./src --output-dir ./docs --file-ext html

author: Thomas Steiner <steiner.thomas@gmail.com> (http://blog.tomayac.com/)
